scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo-angular && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-angular && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-angular && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo-angular && npm link nativescript-zeroconf && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios.debug: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns debug ios --syncAllFiles --inspector
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android.debug: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns debug android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-zeroconf && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo-angular && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
